评论详情: Stylish and adorable graphic baby tees for ladies.  Pullover t-shirt, crew neck, slim fit, short sleeves, attractively printed graphic, and elastic material.  Spandex is a softer, warmer, stretchier, breathable, skin-friendly, and more comfortable material.
I got this for my daughter who just started high school and is finding her own style. She paired this with a pair of white jeans and it was the easiest/cutest outfit!
I bought this for my Granddaughter when she comes for Christmas.  It is so cute and looks just another more expensive brand.

This shirt has a bold, colorful graphic announcing its presence. It's done well, with rich colors and some good detail. The shirt fits as stated in the product description, with a moderate crop -- just in line with the belly button.  The tee shirt itself is decent quality, but kind of thin. After washing and drying a few times, the stitching is still fine, and the image still looks new, but the fabric curling just a tiny bit. It's definitely good enough for a season or two, which I guess is about the expectation.  This tee shirt has a colorful image and decent fabric. I recommend it.

This top is so much cuter in person! It fits true to size and would make a great gift! I love the colors and designs they have o. These are fashionable as well as practical. I highly recommend this adorable crop top to anyone trying to keep cooled off while staying fashionable.

Just like photo says. Fits is accurate. There is no tag. Material is medium thickness and cotton cropped. The white is actually white, not off white. The graphic is printed in and not raised. It is simple and My teen loves it. (Y2K Graphic Tees for Women Retro Aesthetic Pattern Crop Tops Teen Girls Crewneck Vintage Baby Tee Slim Fit )

I got the t-shirt that looks like an Italian post card.  Very cute but not something that I will wear all the top.  It is quite short - ok if you don’t mind your midriff showing.  The quality is ok but not great.

I'm seeing this design of shirt EVERYWHERE! It's so cute and goes with pretty much any type of bottom or jacket/cardigan. So easy to style, soft fabric, not too thin but definitely isn't very thick, and it's cropped just a bit below the belly button on me. Only slightly see through so make sure you wear nude colored undergarments under it. Love it!

评论概述: Great shirt but shorter than expected
评论详情: I really like this shirt and love the high quality graphic. Unfortunately, it is way more cropped than the picture shows. If you don’t want the seam to hit above your belly button I would recommend buying it a size or maybe even two sizes up. However I do like how the white fabric is not see through, I just wish it fit how it showed in the picture.
This is a crop top! It’s a little smaller than I expected but still great for a summer day. It’s a recommend for sure!
The shirt was soft and seemed decent quality, but the print was horrible, and I returned it after looking at it. The fit of the tee is also different expected, I wouldn't recommend it.
